QuestData.Title: Ihgaluk Crag
QuestData.Description: Aethas has taken over at Ihgaluk Crag, to the southeast, continuing his effort to turn the Saurok against the Zandalari and mogu.$B$BGo to him, and help in any way that you can.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Archmage Aethas Sunreaver outside of Ihgaluk Crag.
